title: Expert panel says mistakes led to coronavirus pandemic, but stops short of holding countries, leaders to account
content:
1. Expert panel says mistakes led to coronavirus pandemic, but stops short of holding countries, leaders to account  The Washington Post
  2. WCNC Charlotte. Always On. Streaming News for May 12, 2021  WCNC
  3. Covid pandemic was preventable, says WHO-commissioned report  The Guardian
  4. Panel suggests WHO should have more power to stop pandemics  Fox News
  5. WHO and global leaders could have averted Covid calamity, experts say  Financial Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
